text: A huge halberd once carried by Dark Lord Khalak of Ghrond, the first Captain of the Black Guard. Each captain since has pried it out of his predecessor's dead hands.
Crimson Death
A magic armour first worn by Arnaetbron, a veteran of the sundering. Those who wish to attack the wearer must endure a shock of paralysing pain.
Armour of Grief
Staff of Doom is a talisman of one of the six High Mistresses of the Covenant of Sorceresses.
Staff of Doom
At the caster’s command, light is driven from the battlefield and numbing darkness rushes to fill the void.
Shroud of Despair
At the caster’s command, light is driven from the battlefield and numbing darkness rushes to fill the void.
Empowered Shroud of Despair
Made from the corpse of a dead Kharibdyss and infused with dark magic that is has the power summon forth those slain by the Kharibdyss while it was alive.
Kharibdyss Armour
Sucking the life essence of a foe and use it to heal the caster. Steal Life has no effect on the Undead.
Steal Life
Archmage grants a blessing to those that fight with her.
Protection of Saphery
Archmages grants greater blessing of protection spell to all those that offer to protect her.
Greater Protection of Saphery
Shield of Hoeth
Never underestimate the power of a Saphery mage's as they can wield magic mere mortal can only dream of.
Archmage grants a blessing to those that fight with her.
Protection of Saphery
Lightning Storm
Summons a storm of lightning anywhere within a wide area. This is an Aethyric storm summoned from the Realm of Chaos and may appear anywhere, from the deepest sewer to the wildest heath.
Iceshard Staff
Razor-sharp shards of ice hurl from the chill skies to blind and dishearten the foe.
A powerful enchanted bow only given to the everqueens chief handmaiden to command it power.
Star Bow of Averlorn
Spear of Cythral
A gift from Daith for the Lord of Cythral.
